summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5570 for the improvement of 37th Avenue West, from the south line of Block 10, Briarcliff Addition, to West Armour Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 72790, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
